item.description:
I don’t know what AR had to admit to, but it must have been good to have a holiday for it.

To celebrate, we should be ready to admit that we probably could write more. Which is what we’ll be doing on Tuesday.

And if anyone else wants to admit to something, like pulling that chair out from under Wendy in 1st grade, we’ll be listening and possibly taking notes.

I’ll start off by admitting that I’m addicted to useless facts.
item.name: Let's celebrate Arkansas Admission Day with some writing exercises!
